name: Friday night funkin's vs sans (Full week)[Remake]
name_original: Friday night funkin's vs sans (Full week)[Remake]
description: Recently been thinking about the idea of turning this "Vs. Sans" project into a full FNF x UT crossover. I've been pretty hesitant to do this for a few reasons, main one just being generally how long that would take to do. I have some ideas for it though.
